title: Map It
subtitle: Give them a map, and make it easy for your Fans and Friends to find you, your brand, or a special event offline.
bells_whistles: Fully functional embedded Google map including a "give me directions" input field helps your fans navigate to a specific location.

features.title: Easy Design
features.description: Our Content Management System makes creating, editing, and updating your Facebook app simple. Easy editing tools let you change directions quickly - not holding you to your "web guy's" schedule.

features.title: Get More Fans
features.description: Our fan gate feature entices new viewers to "like" your Page before they can interact with your apps. This can explosively drive up your fan count, giving you a large audience to message, activate promotions, and push out must-have content to in the future.

features.title: Customizable Header
features.description: An optional customizable and linkable header, turned on/off via the Content Management Panel, allows for important brand impressions.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.
